Fully grown ofalths capture victims and slowly eat them alive. **[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)): DC 27 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 [Ofalth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3117) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 249 1.1 **Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19 **Str** +7 **Dex** +3 **Con** +6 **Int** -2 **Wis** +2 **Cha** -2 **Refuse Pile** When they're not in danger, an ofalth can spend 1 minute settling into a 10-foot pile that looks like a heap of garbage. Until the next time it takes an action, the ofalth gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC. A creature that enters the area of the garbage heap or interacts with it must attempt a save against the ofalth's stench. --- **AC** 31 **Fort** +22 **Ref** +17 **Will** +18 **HP** 170 (filth wallow) **Immunities** [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) **Filth Wallow** An ofalth gains [fast healing 2](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=62) when in an area with a high concentration of debris or excrement, such as a refuse heap or sewer.
**[Stench](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=76)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=664)) 30 feet, DC 28 --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** fist +23 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d12+13 bludgeoning plus wretched weeps **Ranged** offal +19 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d10+9 bludgeoning plus wretched weeps **Wretched Weeps** ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 26 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 2d4 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) every hour and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) (1 day); **Stage 3** 2d6 persistent bleed every hour and enfeebled 2 (1 day)
